title: A word to the well-inclin'd of all perswasions together with a coppy of a letter from William Penn to George Keith, upon his arbitrary summons and unjust proceedings, at Turners-Hall, against the people called Quakers.
author: Story, Thomas, 1662-1742.
publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Story. cf. NUC pre-1956.
